name: Sysdig-CLI-Scan
description: Scan images and infrastructure as code with Sysdig Secure as part of your development pipeline.
author: Sysdig

inputs.name: sysdigurl
inputs.label: Sysdig Sysdig Secure SaaS Reion.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sysdig Secure Region. Default to Sysdig Secure US East (https://secure.sysdig.com)

inputs.name: apikey
inputs.label: Sysdig Secure API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sysdig Secure API token for authentication.

inputs.name: failBuild
inputs.label: Fail build if policy evaluation fails.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail the build if policy evaluation fails.

inputs.name: skipTLS
inputs.label: Skip TLS verification
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip TLS verification when calling Sysdig endpoints.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Verbose logging output
inputs.helpMarkDown: More verbose logging output from the Sysdig CLI Scanner.

inputs.name: fullVulnsTable
inputs.label: Output full vulnerability table
inputs.helpMarkDown: Outputs the full vulnerability table in the console output.

inputs.name: jsonOutputFile
inputs.label: JSON output file of the result. It will be ignored if jsonOutput is false
inputs.helpMarkDown: What file to export the result to. It will be ignored if jsonOutput is false

inputs.name: autoPublishArtifacts
inputs.label: Wether to publish the JSON output file as a build artifact. If jsonOutput is false, this will be ignored
inputs.helpMarkDown: Wether to publish the JSON output file as a build artifact. If jsonOutput is false, this will be ignored

inputs.name: sysdigCliScannerVersion
inputs.label: Version of the Sysdig CLI Scanner to use. Latest will be used if not specified
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the Sysdig CLI Scanner to use. Latest will be used if not specified

inputs.name: policy
inputs.label: Policy to evaluate in the pipeline execution. If not specified, only the Always Apply policy will be evaluated.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Policy to evaluate in the pipeline execution. If not specified, only the Always Apply policy will be evaluated.
